step1.title: What's your English name?
step1.subtitle: We'll find Korean names that sound similar and beautiful
step1.culturalNote: In Korean culture, names carry deep meaning and are chosen to bring good fortune!

step2.title: When were you born?
step2.subtitle: We need this for traditional Saju fortune reading
step2.culturalNote: Saju (사주팔자) uses your birth time to determine your life's fortune and perfect name elements

step3.title: Gender preference?
step3.subtitle: This helps us choose the most suitable Korean name style
step3.culturalNote: Korean names often reflect different qualities - some are more gentle, others more strong!
